casebody.data:
The WESTON GROUP, INC., Petitioner
v.
HIGHMARK HEALTH SERVICES, formerly Highmark, Inc., d/b/a Highmark Blue Shield and Model Consulting, Inc., Respondents No. 727 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 28, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 28th day of March, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
